channel.title: Very Long Loading Times
channel.description:
Hello, I have been finding that the only issue I have with the game is the loading times. For me they will range between 45secs-1min and they noticeably get longer at the portal to xen in the Black Mesa complex. This is the only Source engine game I have had loading times worthy of being called obnoxious, even the load times of Black Mesa 2012 were super fast in comparison like 5-10sec. My computer specs are
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 765M RAM: 16GB Hardrive model: WD7500BPKX-80HPJ0 Hardrive RPM: 7200 RPM
Please help me resolve this issue as I foresee myself playing this game many many more times.
